relation: There are great shopping malls in the area and Garden City is fun place-a lot of culture and very pretty sweet town!
The cafeteria is awesome! They have a Starbucks and lots of food options.
I am not familiar with the dorm life, but my friends seem to say it is ok.
Depending on your major, the work load can be vigorous.
Make sure you can afford it! It is expensive!!!

Adelphi is committed to integrity and making sure their students are successful. They put a great deal of stress on building connection with the professors. The professors and faculty are always arable and willing to help students out.
pageTitle: Adelphi University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Christopher from Bohemia, NY 05/11/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 8 out of 9 people found this review useful. 2 of 62 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Nursing, Business, Math, Computer Science, Psychology majors and anyone who enjoys being on Long Island. Tips for prospective students Do well on your AP exams, they pay off dearly. Bang for the buck With all of the services offered to me the high cost seems very small. Am enjoying being here I have made many new friends, we have fun, party, and study together. The complete college experience. Am learning a lot The courses for Math and Computer Science majors / double majors are rigorous and require you to learn the material thoroughly to pass the classes.
